desc.en: The Arius Squad has been abandoned. Will there be mercy for the students who are lost to its teachings of hatred and anger?

desc.ko: The Arius Squad has been abandoned. Will there be mercy for the students who are lost to its teachings of hatred and anger?
desc.zh_tw: 被自己所属的学院抛弃的奥利斯小队——徘徊于憎恶与愤怒之间的她们，真的存在着慈悲吗？
